Models

Production in a circular economy

   Produce in a circular economy
     A0: Produce in a circular economy
       Design Product
         A1: Design Product
           Identify engineering problem
           Determine customer profile
             A12: Determine customer profile
               Analyze stakeholders
               Determine product opportunity
           Establish engineering specifications
           Converge on design
             A14: Converge on design
               Generate design concepts
               Evaluate design concepts
               Finalize design concept/s
           Create prototypes
       Acquire Materials
         A2: Acquire Materials
           Extract materials
           Process materials
       Produce Product
         A3: Produce Product
           Manufacture
           Assemble
           Distribute
           Prepare Product Design for Production
             A34: Prepare Product Design for Production
               Define Production Processes
               Design Production Systems
               Develop Production Sequence
       Use and Consume
         A4: Use and Consume
           Purchase
           Use Product
           End of Use
           By-product recapture
           Store product
           Downcycle product
       Treat at End of Life
         A5: Treat at End of Life
           Collect end-of-life products
           Clean/separate/sort products
           Treat end-of-life products
             A53: Treat end-of-life products
               Reuse
                 A531: Reuse
                   Inspect reusable product
                   Replace reusable product
                   Reassemble reusable product
                   Test reusable product
               Disassemble product
                 A532: Disassemble product
                   Mechanical separation
                   Isolate dismantled streams
                   Test
               Remanufacture
                 A533: Remanufacture
                   Inspect remanufacturable product
                   Refurbish remanufacturable product
                   Reassemble remanufacturable product
                   Test remanufacturable product
               Recycle
                 A534: Recycle
                   Mechanical recycling
                   Chemical recycling
               Incinerate
               Landfill

  2. Barkmeyer, E. J., Christopher, N., Feng, S. C., Fowler, J. E., Frechette, S. P., Jones, A., Jurrens, K., Lyons, K., McLean, C. R., Pratt, M., Scott, H. A., Senehi, M. K., Sriram, R. D., & Wallace, E. K. (1996). SIMA reference architecture, part 1: Activity models (No. NIST IR 5939; p. NIST IR 5939). National Institute of Standards and Technology. https://doi.org/10.6028/NIST.IR.5939
